description: Engage with climate projections data, assess climate risks and impacts, and evaluate solutions using past and future climate data.
Assess climate risks and impacts through data analysis and propose mitigation strategies for specific sectors.
Evaluate climate risk solutions and communicate sustainable approaches for stakeholders.
Weekly contributions to forum discussions on climate topics, assessed for research, analysis, and communication skills (mid-term assessment).
Continued participation in forum discussions, demonstrating critical engagement with course themes (end-term assessment).
Multiple choice test covering climate processes, data analysis, and risk frameworks from weeks 1-3.
Multiple choice test assessing understanding of climate projections, sectoral impacts, and adaptation strategies from weeks 4-6.
Multiple choice test evaluating knowledge of mitigation actions, technological risks, and global frameworks from weeks 7-10.
